QuestData.Title: Greenstalker
QuestData.Description:
The mighty wolf Greenstalker was once a protector of these forests. He has fallen under the sway of dark forces. My brother and I attempted to calm his spirit, but he is too far gone.
Use the charm I have constructed to weaken him. I ask you $c, please, end his suffering.
My brother is still weak and I must stay to protect him. Go now before the wolf consumes us all!
QuestData.RewardText: A grim but necessary task. I hope Greenstalker's spirit will find peace now.$b$bBe careful, $n. These woods are being twisted by ancient power.
